resources.string: This application is project for class Programming mobile applications, on FTN in Čačak. Creator of this app is Biljana Kurćubić , index 404/2021. Mountains are towering landforms that rise prominently above the Earth\'s surface. They are characterized by their significant elevation, often exceeding 1,000 meters (3,280 feet) above sea level. Mountains are formed through geological processes, including tectonic plate movements, volcanic activity, and erosion. They come in various shapes and sizes, from rugged peaks with steep slopes to gentle, rolling hills. Mountains play a crucial role in shaping landscapes, influencing weather patterns, and providing habitats for diverse ecosystems. They also hold cultural and recreational significance for people worldwide, attracting adventurers, hikers, and nature enthusiasts seeking both challenge and beauty in these majestic natural wonders.

Ova aplikacija je rađena u okviru predmeta Programiranje mobilnih aplikacija, na FTN u Čačku. Kreator ove aplikacije je Biljana Kurćubić, indeksa 404/2021. Planine su visoki prirodni oblici zemljišta koji se uzdižu iznad površine Zemlje. Karakteriše ih značajna nadmorska visina, često veća od 1.000 metara iznad nivoa mora. Planine se formiraju kroz geološke procese, uključujući pomeranje tektonskih ploča, vulkansku aktivnost i eroziju. Dolaze u različitim oblicima i veličinama, od strmih vrhova sa strminama do blagih, valovitih brda. Planine igraju ključnu ulogu u oblikovanju pejzaža, utiču na obrasce vremena i pružaju staništa raznolikim ekosistemima. Takođe imaju kulturni i rekreativni značaj za ljude širom sveta, privlače avanturiste, planinare i ljubitelje prirode koji traže izazov i lepotu u ovim veličanstvenim prirodnim čudima.
